metadata.title: CVE-2018-5806 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
An error within the "leaf_hdr_load_raw()" function(internal/dcraw_common.cpp) in LibRaw versions prior to 0.18.8 can beexploited to trigger a NULL pointer dereference.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5806` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.15.4-1ubuntu0.2
libraw9 - 0.15.4-1ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libraw package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.15.4-1ubuntu0.2').
ufraw: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
